page.title: 08A day in my life,by Melanie
page.content: It's 6.45 a.m. and I've just been woken up by my Dad's alarm.I get dressed into my uniform,then I brush my hair and put it into a ponytail. When I've had my breakfast of toast and marmalade I let Barney our dog outside.I also go outside to feed the animals.When I come back in I brush my teeth and get washed. At 8.20 a.m. my Dad takes me to school,where we play until the bell goes.Now it's time for assembly,at which we sing a hymn and say a prayer.We then go into our classroom and work at Maths, English, French,Geography,History,Science or Art.In between Maths and English we have a break,then it's lunch.After lunch,more lessons,which last until 4.00 p.m.After tea we have prep until 5.00 p.m. which is when I go home.At home I get changed and I play for a while,watch T.V. and go to bed at 8.30
